products.name: rOtring 600 Mechanical Pencil
products.shortDesc: HB 0.5 mm | Green All-Metal Body | Hexagonal Barrel
products.description: The rOtring 600 is a sleek, metal mechanical pencil built with precision and convenience in mind. The full metal body provides balance of weight, ideal for artists, students, and working professionals.
features: Full metal body provides balance of weight, ideal for artists, students, and working professionals.
Brass mechanism for precision lead advancement, and a fixed lead guidance sleeve to prevent break and offer an unimpeded view of the page for precise ruler—based drawing.
Hexagonal barrel ensures fatigue-free writing and drawing, and prevents the pencil from sliding when laid on surfaces.
Non-slip metal knurled grip makes sure that the pencil remains safely in hand so there are no accidental slips.
Built in erase under the push-button cap for quick erasing, to ensure mistakes aren't permanent.
Refillable and loaded with high-polymer HB leads.
Signature rOtring red ring is clear and a symbol of quality and precision.

products.name: Casio Vintage A-158WA-1Q Digital Grey Dial Unisex Watch Silver Metal Strap (D011)
products.shortDesc: Digital Grey Dial Unisex Watch Silver Metal Strap
products.description: The Casio Vintage A-158WA-1Q is a classic digital watch that combines retro style with modern functionality. It features a grey dial with a rectangular case and a silver metal strap. The watch is water-resistant and has a battery life of up to 7 years.
features: Dial Color: Grey, Case Shape: Rectangular, Dial Glass material: Mineral
Band Color: Silver, Band Material: Stainless Steel
Watch Movement Type: Quartz, Watch Display Type: Digital and Stainless Steel Bezel
Case Material: Stainless Steel, Case Diameter: 32 millimeters , Size of case : 36.8×33.2×8.2mm
